title: learn Figma
author: vikram
description: Figma is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool used for user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design. It is primarily aimed at designers, allowing them to create, collaborate on, and share digital design files and prototypes in real-time. Figma has gained popularity for its collaborative and cloud-based nature, making it a valuable tool for design teams and individuals working on web and app design projects. Here are some key features and aspects of Figma.
